title: Zeit House Down 2/9: Mary Wilson, Chewbacca Defense, Britney Spears, Chris Hemsworth, Streaker, Armie Hammer
itunes:title: Zeit House Down 2/9: Mary Wilson, Chewbacca Defense, Britney Spears, Chris Hemsworth, Streaker, Armie Hammer
description:
On this edition of Zeit House Down Jack and Miles discuss the passing of Motown legend Mary Wilson, a reference to South Park and how it relates to the Impeachment trial today, Miles reflects briefly on the Britney Spears documentary, Chris Hemsworth's body double is stressing, supposedly a streaker bet that a streaker would appear during the Super Bowl, and the two briefly discuss the rumors around Armie Hammer (but more coming soon).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
